name: Baseball Megastar 19
description:
Step up to the plate in Baseball Megastar 19 as you take on the role of an ambitious player trying to make it big in the fiercely competitive World of Professional Baseball.

Do you have the talent to progress from being a local hero, in the minors, into a legend in the Big League - becoming the ultimate Baseball Megastar.

Create your player, dig in at the plate, go on a hitting streak, get noticed by the major teams and follow the agony and ecstasy of a career in Baseball.

With easy pick-up-and-play tap and swipe controls, story led levels and stunning visuals this is a game that all Baseball fans can enjoy.

So, now's the time to step up to the plate and become a Megastar.

FEATURES
- New for this Year, take control of both pitching and batting sides of the game.

- Game levels that follow your career, taking you from Bootcamp through the minors all the way to the major leagues.

- Simple and intuitive touch controls that are easy to learn, yet with depth for more expert players.

- High quality 3D visuals that provide an authentic and atmospheric experience.

- Pure Baseball batting and pitching fun.


IMPORTANT
This game is free to play but does includes optional in-app purchases that may be bought with real money.
